body_html:
I fixed it via a hack of sorts: modify these lines

pytorch/torch/CMakeLists.txt

Line 362 in a01d6f0

target_link_libraries(test_jit torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES})

pytorch/torch/CMakeLists.txt

Line 414 in a01d6f0

target_link_libraries(test_api torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES})

to

target_link_libraries(test_jit torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})

target_link_libraries(test_api torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})

respectively.

@ezyang is this is a good enough fix ?
body_text:
I fixed it via a hack of sorts: modify these lines

  
    
      pytorch/torch/CMakeLists.txt
    
    
         Line 362
      in
      a01d6f0
    
    
    
    

        
          
           target_link_libraries(test_jit torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES}) 
        
    
  



  
    
      pytorch/torch/CMakeLists.txt
    
    
         Line 414
      in
      a01d6f0
    
    
    
    

        
          
           target_link_libraries(test_api torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES}) 
        
    
  


to
target_link_libraries(test_jit torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})

target_link_libraries(test_api torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})

respectively.
@ezyang is this is a good enough fix ?
body:
I fixed it via a hack of sorts: modify these lines
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/a01d6f01b5547a396d6e28f95538cd061e14d29a/torch/CMakeLists.txt#L362 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/a01d6f01b5547a396d6e28f95538cd061e14d29a/torch/CMakeLists.txt#L414

to 
```
target_link_libraries(test_jit torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})
```
```
target_link_libraries(test_api torch ${TORCH_CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})
```
respectively.

@ezyang is this is a good enough fix ?
